dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 1190 RH: Expanding Access to Capital for Rural Job Creators Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Downing (for himself, Ms. Bynum, Mr. Nunn of Iowa, and Mr. Pappas) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services
Additional sponsors: Mr. Sessions and Mr. Vindman
Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed
action.action-instruction: Strike out all after the enacting clause and insert the part printed in italic
For text of introduced bill, see copy of bill as introduced on February 11, 2025

form.official-title: To amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to expand access to capital for rural-area small businesses, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Expanding Access to Capital for Rural Job Creators Act.

section.header: Access to capital for rural-area small businesses
section.text: Section 4(j) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (15 U.S.C. 78d(j)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (4)(C), by inserting , rural-area small businesses after women-owned small businesses; and
in paragraph (6)(B)(iii), by inserting , rural-area small businesses after women-owned small businesses.

endorsement.action-desc: Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed
